boardgame.name: World in Flames
World in Flames Collector_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s edition
boardgame.description: (from ADG website :)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;World in Flames is Australian Design group's international award winning game that is the strategic game of World War II. Five full-colour maps portray all the theatres of war: Europe, Russia, Africa, the Middle East, India, Asia, the Pacific, the Atlantic and (most importantly) Australia._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;[...]Counters represent the armies and corps, the aircraft carriers, the naval task forces and the air groups that took part. Everything you need to re-fight the greatest conflict in history._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Two to six players make the strategic decisions that decide the fate of nations. What forces to produce, where to commit them, when and how? No two games of World in Flames play the same, no strategy is foolproof, any decision may have unforseen, long-term consequences._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;World in Flames contains all the latest top quality components, 1400 counters, 5 maps, 2 combat charts, one Production Circle and the comprehensive rules and scenarios booklets, that have been extensively updated and revised based on 2 million playing hours of the world's greatest game._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

Appears to be missing about thirty counters (out of 1200). Everything else *seems* to be there, but I can_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t find a definitive parts list. Most of the counters haven_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t been punched.

Punched. Lovingly played and packed. Game map and all other components are present. The box is in good condition (scuffed corners from storage, no splits). Will ship a day or so after I receive your payment and $7.50 for USPS Parcel (actual charges if Non-US address).

5th Edition. Planes in Flames included! Game is complete but has been punched and played. Counters, maps, box, rules, etc., are all in very good condition. Paypal payments cannot be from a debit/credit card. Actual shipping from zip code 48104 to your location via your preferred shipping method.
WiF 2000 Update Kit: New Maps, Rules, and updated counters for Deluxe WiF
Shipping 5$ US Canada, World 12$

Box: In very good condition some light rubbing on the edges and corner Counters: 1000 punched counters all counted and present. Sorted in multiple bags Board: Two large heavy paper maps, both in excellent condition Rules: 4th edition rules 36 pages, 4th edition advanced rules and scenarios 28 pages, errata and price list. Both in excellent condtion with errata notes made in the rule book in pencil Reference cards: Counter sheet ID, build charts *2, 4th edition quick reference charts *2, 5th edition quick reference charts *2, production spiral chart Dice: 1*D6 Extras: articles see below Weight: 1400g packed Article from “fire and movement” magasine (scans) Nothing hotter than world in flames Close Up: World in flames As the world burns The sun slowly sets on the British Empire Siberia is not such a bad place to live Tokyo my kind of town The view from Berlin Roosevelts Diary Playing with the big boys Designers response WIF errata, changes, explainations … WIF review WIF player notes

The map: final edition, perfect condition, never used The counters: final edition, perfect, never punched out The booklets: final edition, perfect, never used The box: 4th edition, somewhat used condition Extra: included all 4th edition counters as an added bonus

4th edition rules, 5th edition counters, rules and maps, Asia in Flames, Planes in Flames, Days of Decision and Days of Decision II. Haven_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t confirmed but almost all counters are present. Some counters are still unpunched for Planes in Flames and Days of Decision. Maps have a few handwritten corrections. All components used. Boxes are quite worn.

This game is mostly unpunched and never played. The box has some wear and dishing from being stacked but no torn corners. It is 100% complete, I counted every single token. The rules have some moderate wear from being read numerous times and on the very back page has a slight brownish tint from a beverage accident. It is not significant. This is the 5th Edition. Buyer will pay postage not to exceed the USPS Priority Mail flat rate of $8.95. Insurance would be an additional $1.65. International buyers would need to contact me for rates.
Final Edition Unpunched

This is the 5th Edition of World in Flames. The box shows very minimal wear and tear. The components look like new and are complete. The counters are unpunched. Shipping _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Handling to Germany will cost 4,40 € (Paeckchen) or 7,40 € (Paket). Shipping _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Handling to Europe will usually cost 9,10 € (without insurance) or 17,50 € (with insurance). Shipping _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Handling worldwide will usually cost 13,40 €(without insurance) or 32,50 € (with insurance). Payment can be done by remittance or PayPal. You can also purchase the World in Flames Annual from 1993 for additional 10 €. This includes 84 pages of information about World in Flames (strategy notes, tactical hints, complete errata and more). Further I would like to mention that I also sell Planes in Flames here on BGG.
Reserved for Jason S
Final Edition.
Game has seen some play, but should be complete and is in pretty good shape, all in all. Counters are punched and sorted into baggies.
Item has already been sold in the GeekList auction, so unless you won it there, please do not buy this item!

World in Flames Deluxe Final Version. This version of WiF includes the base game and five expansions: World in Flames, Ships in Flames, Planes in Flames, Mech in Flames, Asia Aflame and Africa Aflame. 4 large (594 x 840 mm) maps of Europe, Asia _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; the Pacific 665 x 466 mm map of Africa 294 x 175 mm map of Scandinavia 420 x 297 map of America 3400 counters (Wif sheet 1-9, 14, 15, _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; 18-24) Wif Deluxe rules (integrating Ships in Flames, Planes in Flames, Mech in Flames, Asia Aflame and Africa Aflame) 1 x Final edition combat charts Perfect condition with unpunched counters. Buyer pays for shipping and shipping insurance (not included in the price).

3rd Edition. Punched and bagged, game is complete. All components are in excellent condition. Box shows light shelf-wear. I will throw in a counter tray as a bonus.

World in Flames bundle - Final Edition + Days of Decision II + Planes in Flames + Asia Aflame + 1994/5 Annual + 1998 Annual + Canadian Wargamers Group WiF Annual. Includes box and counters from 5th Edition, and Days of Decision I. Used.
Unpunched game in excellent condition, box is like new

WiF Deluxe - The Final Edition. In addition to the expansion sets originally packaged with this edition (Ships in Flames, Planes in Flames, Asia Aflame, Africa Aflame, Mech in Flames), my copy includes Convoys in Flames, Cruisers in Flames, and Carrier Planes in Flames. Excellent condition, never played (lack of time!). All components present and correct; a few countersheets punched, but the majority remain intact (16 sheets are still unpunched).

Mint in shrink. This is the final edition. Deluxe Version (ie it comes with everything). This copy retails for $200 from ADG, but is currently hard to find in this version. International buyers are welcome. Shipping will be at cost. $11 for shipping in the USA. Free in Minnesota. Picture of actual game included.

This is the 5th Edition game (whic is different than the final edition). This game is unpunched / unplayed. The rulebook does show signs of being read (fully intact, but slightly stained where it was being held). As a bonus I have included counter sheet 6 from Days of Decision. It is mostly unpunched, but is missing all of the country flags (they are probably the least important piece in the game and only needed if you play DoD). All the bonus units that work in the base game are still unpunched on the counter sheet. $10 shipping for anywhere in the US. International buyers are welcome and shipping will be at cost (quotes can be provided). Actual picture of the game is below. 5th Edition
For The Killing Joke only--auction win.

This is the Final Edition (2007). All games are new and in their original wrapping and all prices include the German VAT (7% or 19%). We offer only goods that we have in stock. We ship worldwide – please ask for a quote about exact shipping costs (rest assured that we always try to keep them as low as possible). Payment may be made by Paypal or bank transfer in advance. For orders above €50 we grant a discount of €5 on shipping costs. If you have any questions, feel free to send us an email (laden@gamers-hq.de), give us a call (+49 30 79706126) or visit our homepage (www.gamers-hq.de). Our Terms and Conditions 1. General All transactions between Gamers HQ and you, the customer, are subject to the following conditions, which you acknowledge by accepting delivery of your ordered products. These conditions do not affect your statutory rights and in all cases German law applies. 2. Orders and prices We do our level best to ensure that the information on our website is up-to-date. Please note that offers and prices are subject to change. We work to ensure that our prices are all correct, but cannot be held responsible for accidentally displaying the wrong price of a product. All prices are quoted in Euros and already include all necessary taxes. 3. Lead times and delivery costs Our products are delivered directly from our Berlin base, and orders are usually dispatched within two working days. Dispatch and transport are at the expense of the customer. We usually ship orders with DHL but explicitly reserve the right to choose another method of transport. If an order is split into several deliveries, each delivery counts as a separate transaction. Delivery within Germany is free of charge if your order amounts to a total of 50 euros or more. Below that amount, we charge a one-off fee of 5 euros. Our products can also be ordered for delivery outside Germany. In that case, an estimate of the delivery costs is added to your order during checkout. Please note that this delivery cost estimate does not necessarily constitute the final amount. We shall contact you personally by email after you have placed your order to present you with delivery options and to quote the final price for delivery costs. 4. Payment options We currently offer the following three payment options: direct debit from your bank account (only within Germany), bank transfer (prepayment) and PayPal. Once you have placed three orders, we also offer you the option to pay by invoice. Such privileges can, however, be withdrawn should we encounter repeated delays in settling invoices. 5. Cancellations, Refunds _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Returns Should you wish to cancel your order, you can do so by notifying us by fax, email, letter or by simply returning your product(s) to Gamers HQ. No questions asked. Please note that such a cancellation has to be done within two weeks after having received your ordered product(s). Should you have already paid for your order, we shall refund those costs to you as soon as we have received your cancellation notification. Please ensure that any products returned are in good condition. If you check the products in a manner that you will have done, for example, in a shop, this is fine. Any other handling of the product(s) might entitle Gamers HQ to some compensation from you, which might in rare cases amount to the original sum paid for the product(s). So should you feel that you might cancel your order by returning the products, please limit your inspection of the products to optical checks and do not use them on a regular basis. If you return your order within two weeks in the above manner, we shall refund you the costs for sending the product(s) back to us (unless your cancelled order amounts less than 20 euros, in which case you as the customer will bear the cost of return postage). Please ensure that you use appropriate packing material when sending back the product(s) — preferably using the original wrapping. Please note that German law, following the EU directive 97/7/EG of 20 May 1997, specifies that the right to return items and receive a full refund is not applicable to the purchase of newspapers, magazines or journals (§312d BGB) as well as the purchase of audio- or video-recordings and software once you have broken the seal of the package. Should we accidently send you the wrong products, please return them to us and we shall refund you the return postage immediately. Any cancellation of an order has to be done in writing (by post, fax or email). 6. Ownership Please note that ordered products remain our property until you have fully paid for them. 7. Personal data We are committed to protecting your personal information and will keep the information you entrust to us safely and securely. We may collect information from you to monitor website visitor patterns, so that we can improve our website. We also collect information from you to handle orders, deliver products and services, process payments, communicate with you about orders, products and services, update our records and generally maintain your customer profile with us. However, we shall never sell or share your personal information with third parties. Our customer data — in so far as required to provide the above services and within the limits defined by the data protection laws of Germany (paragraph 26 BDSG) — is saved and handled on a separate, network-independent computer. 8. Other matters We reserve the right to reject orders without any explanation. Also please note that you as a customer cannot assert a claim against Gamers HQ if, for whatever reason, we are unable to source the item(s) you have ordered. Such cases arise only very exceptionally; we try to ensure that everything we advertise in our web shop is in stock. Where, for whatever reason, we are unable to deliver we promptly refund in full everything you have paid. 9. Limitation of liability: external links Although we check the content of external links provided on our website, we have no control over or responsibility for these domains to which we provide the links or which link to us. That responsibility solely rests with those who manage the respective domains. 10. Place of jurisdiction Any disputes arising hereunder will be settled before a Berlin court. We reserve the right to choose the customer_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s place of jurisdiction instead. 11. Severability clause If parts of these terms and conditions become ineffective, the remainder of these terms still apply. Dies ist die _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Final Edition_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; von 2007. Innerhalb Deutschlands gilt: Alle Spiele sind Neuware und in Orginalverpackung . Alle Preise sind inklusive der gesetzlichen Mehrwertsteuer von 7% bzw. 19%. Die Versandkosten betragen 5,00 € innerhalb Deutschlands. Ab einem Bestellwert von 50,00 € fallen keine Versandkosten innerhalb Deutschlands an! Bezahlt werden kann per paypal, Vorauskasse, Bankeinzug oder direkt bei uns im Laden (wenn ihr aus Berlin kommt). Wenn ihr noch irgendwelche Fragen habt, ruft uns an (030 79706126), schickt uns ne Mail (laden@gamers-hq.de) oder besucht unsere Homepage (www.gamers-hq.de). AGB: 1. Allgemeines Alle Transaktionen zwischen dem Gamers HQ und seinen Kunden unterliegen ausschließlich den nachfolgenden Allgemeinen Geschäftsbedingungen und basieren auf der Grundlage des Rechts der Bundesrepublik Deutschland. Diese AGB gelten mit der Annahme der Sendung des Gamers-HQ als anerkannt. 2. Auftragsannahme und Preise Alle Angebote und Preise sind freibleibend; Liefermöglichkeit vorbehalten. Preisänderungen, auch ohne Ankündigung, oder Irrtümer sind jederzeit vorbehalten. Alle Preisangaben sind in Euro und inklusive der gesetzlichen Mehrwertsteuer. 3. Lieferung Alle Lieferungen erfolgen ab dem Gamers-HQ. Alle Lieferungen erfolgen auf Rechnung des Käufers. In der Regel liefern wir mit DHL, in besonderen Fällen kann davon abgewichen werden. Die Entscheidung hierüber liegt beim Gamer´s HQ. Alle Bestellung werden normalerweise innerhalb von 2 Werktagen verschickt. Teillieferungen gelten als jeweils separates Geschäft. Der Versand erfolgt ab einem Rechnungsbetrag von Euro 50,- € innerhalb Deutschlands versandkostenfrei. Bei Bestellungen unter diesem Betrag erheben wir innerhalb Deutschlands eine Versandkostengebühr von Euro 5,-€. 4. Zahlungsbedingungen Wir bieten standartmäßig 3 Möglichkeiten der Bezahlung an: Per Bankeinzug, Vorkasse oder per PayPal .Nach der dritten Bestellung räumen wir unseren Kunden auch die Möglichkeit des Kaufs auf Rechnung ein, wir sind jedoch befugt, diese Möglichkeit bei mehrmaligem Zahlungsverzug auch wieder zu widerrufen. 5. Rückgaberecht Sie können ohne Angabe von Gründen durch Erklärung per Fax, E-Mail oder einfaches Briefschreiben oder durch Rücksendung unserer Waren eine Bestellung widerrufen. Für die Absendung der Widerrufserklärung oder unserer Waren ist eine Widerrufsfrist von zwei Wochen einzuhalten, die mit Eingang unserer Lieferung bei Ihnen beginnt. Ein Widerrufsrecht steht Ihnen - auch innerhalb der Widerrufsfrist - in keinem Fall bei folgenden Waren zu: - Audio- oder Videoaufzeichnungen bzw. Software, wenn Sie die entsprechenden Datenträger entsiegelt haben, - Zeitungen, Zeitschriften und Illustrierten. Unsere Ware ist sofort nach der fristgerechten Ausübung des Widerrufsrechts auf unsere Kosten und Gefahr an uns zurückzusenden, wenn der Widerruf nicht bereits durch Rücksendung ausgeübt wurde. Achten Sie bitte bei der Rücksendung darauf, dass Sie eine geeignete Verpackung benutzen, vorzugsweise die Originalverpackung. Ausnahmsweise sind die Kosten der Rücksendung von Ihnen zu tragen, wenn der Rechnungswert unserer Ware nicht mehr als Euro 20,00 beträgt. In keinem Fall haben Sie die Kosten der Rücksendung zu tragen, wenn die von uns gelieferte Ware nicht der bestellten Ware entspricht. Sollten Sie bereits den Kaufpreis für die Ware bezahlt haben, werden wir diesen nach einem Widerruf unverzüglich zurückerstatten. Wenn Sie unsere Ware nach dem Widerruf ganz oder teilweise nicht oder nur in verschlechtertem Zustand zurücksenden, sind Sie uns gesetzlich zu Wertersatz verpflichtet. Das gilt nicht, soweit Sie unsere Ware lediglich so geprüft haben, wie Sie es z.B. im Ladengeschäft hätten tun können. Jede darüber hinausgehende Nutzung der Ware berechtigt uns jedoch zu Ersatzansprüchen, die unter Umständen die Höhe des Kaufpreises erreichen können. Sollten Sie also einen Widerruf in Betracht ziehen, beschränken Sie sich möglichst auf eine optische Prüfung und nehmen Sie die Ware nicht regulär in Gebrauch. 6. Eigentumsvorbehalt Gelieferte Artikel bleiben bis zur vollständigen Bezahlung Eigentum der Firma Gamers-HQ. 7. Datenspeicherung Unsere Kundendaten – soweit geschäftsnotwendig und im Rahmen des Bundesdatenschutzgesetzes (Paragraph 26 BDSG) zulässig – werden EDV-mäßig gespeichert und verarbeitet (auf einem netzexternen Rechner). Kundendaten werden unter keinen Umständen Dritten zur Verfügung gestellt. 8. Sonstiges Die Ablehnung von Aufträgen, auch ohne Angaben von Gründen, behalten wir uns ausdrücklich vor. Aus Lieferschwierigkeiten unsererseits erwachsen keinerlei Ansprüche gegen das Gamers-HQ. Können Bestellungen aus irgendwelchen Gründen nicht ausgeführt werden, werden bereits geleistete Zahlungen umgehend zurückerstattet. 9. Haftungshinweis Trotz sorgfältiger inhaltlicher Kontrolle übernehmen wir keine Haftung für die Inhalte externer Links. Für den Inhalt der verlinkten Seiten sind ausschließlich deren Betreiber verantwortlich. 10. Gerichtsstand Erfüllungsort und Gerichtsstand ist für beide Teile Berlin. Nach unserer Wahl kann auch am allgemeinen Gerichtsstand des Kunden geklagt werden. 11. Salvatorische Klausel Die Unwirksamkeit einzelner Bestimmungen berührt die Gültigkeit der Geschäftsbedingungen im übrigen nicht.

Unpunched Australian Design Group game World in Flames, 4th edition with both 4th and 5th edition countersheets. Both sets are unpunched. In fact, there_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s two of everything: rules, production spiral, map sets, forms. Only the one counterset says 5th edition. No dice included. All components in near new condition. Box in great shape, no shelf wear just one little bruised corner. Will ship in first class or priority box for $10 to U.S. addresses. $20 to Canada, $30 international. I will combine shipping if you purchase other games at the same time. Magazines and non-boxed games can usually fit in the same box so no additional charge. I will send you a postage total on multiple game orders before confirming your order. I’ve rarely had any issues with loss or damage but U.S. post office does not track first class packages once they leave the U.S. so foreign buyers assume all risk of loss or damage.

Generally very small games fit in the small box, small or medium in the medium box, and large in the large box. Box fits for some games are very snug, allowing minimal protective padding - if this shipping option is picked for such games seller assumes no responsibility for damage during transit. 3) USPS Parcel Select Ground / Non-Flat Rate Priority - varies, usually only cheaper than Flat Rate Priority for small and very light weight games (under 2 pounds), an additional fee of $3.25 for the box and packing materials will be added to the shipping costs. 4) FedEx Ground - varies, usually from $12 for short distance shipments of light weight games to $30 for heavy games (or multiple games up to 10 pounds) long distance shipments. This is usually the cheapest option for very large games. An additional fee of $3.25 for the box and packing materials will be added to the shipping costs. While expensive, this is the best method if damage during transit is a concern, as all items will be packed in boxes sufficiently sized for protective materials. Shipping rates to Alaska or Hawaii will be higher for FedEx. Games will not be shipped by any method other than a shipping box, nor unboxed or in less than complete condition, please do not ask.

World in Flames Classic: Final Edition. Game is partially punched and in excellent condition. Looks like the game was lightly played if at all. Please note, this item is equivalent to the World in Flames Classic Final Edition (which contains counter sheets 1-6 and 24) with a bunch of extras. With a replacement for the missing CS-9 counter sheet, this item would be equivalent to the World in Flames Deluxe Final Edition. This item contains the following components (with year of printing): - Rules Booklet: The Final Edition (2000) - Scenario Booklet (2000) Maps: Western Europe (2000) Eastern Europe (2000) Asia (2000) The Pacific (2000) Africa (1997) The Americas (2000) The Scandanavian Connection (1997) - 2 copies Player Aid Cards: - Task Force Display - from _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Ships in Flames_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; - Production Circle (Sequence of Play/Optional Rules Manifest on back) - Foldout Color Game Chart (with CRTs, Weather, US Entry, ect.) - 3 copies Counter Sheets (each sheet is 200 counters): Punched counters sorted in baggies, labeled with original counter sheet identifier e.g. CS-1). (up) = unpunched counter sheet (** p) = number of counters punched from sheet AfA = Africa AFlame AsA = Asia Aflame MiF = Mech in Flames PiF = Planes in Flames SiF = Ships in Flames CS-1 USA (4 p) CS-2 Commonwealth (up) CS-3 USSR/China (141 p) CS-4 Italy/France (1 p) CS-5 Germany (181 p) CS-6 Japan/Minors (up) CS-7 (PiF CS-1) (up) CS-8 (PiF CS-2) (200 p) CS-9 (PiF CS-3) *MISSING* CS-14 (AfA CS-1) (30 p) CS-15 (AsA CS-1) (66 p) CS-18 (SiF CS-1) USA (up) - two copies CS-19 (SiF CS-2) USA/Italy/Minors (2 p) CS-20 (SiF CS-3) Commonwealth (up) CS-21 (SiF CS-4) Commonwealth/France/Germany (80 p) CS-22 (SiF CS-5) Russia/Japan (47 p) CS-23 (MiF CS-1) (76 p) CS-24 Minor Powers/US Entry (16 p) Total counters (excluding duplicate CS-18): 3,400 (752 punched)
